snippet.title: System Malfunction // Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Game ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/3009900/System_Malfunction/

"System Malfunction" is a first-person horror game set in a mysterious building. The player takes on the role of a security guard who witnesses strange occurrences during the night shift. In a fear-inducing environment, the player explores the building to uncover hidden truths.

Developed by
DCG Entertainment,Inc.
